src_text: IKhabhinethi ibambe i-Lekgotla yayo kusukela mhla ziyi-16 kuya mhla ziyi-19 Ncwaba 2016 eSefako Makgatho Presidential Guesthouse ePitolI-Lekgotla yeKhabhinethi yangoNcwaba 2016 ibe nguphawu oluyinkomba yokuthi isikhathi sokuba sehhovisi kukahulumeni owathatha izintambo zokubusa ngowezi-2014 sesiphakathi naphakathI-Lekgotla yeKhabhinethi ihalalisele iNingizimu Afrika ngokuba noKhetho Lohulumeni Bezindawo olunokuthula, olukhululekile nolungacwasi obelubanjwe mhla zi-3 Ncwaba 2016.I-Lekgotla ibanjwe esimweni esiqhubekayo sesimo sezomnotho esingazinzile esibangelwa ngamaphuzu anhlobonhlobo alapha ekhaya nawangaphandle, kanjalo nengcuphe ehlala ilengela ekhanda lokleliswa kwethu kwezezikweletu emazweni angaphandlI-Lekgotla ihlinzeke ngethuba lokuthi iKhabhinethi idlinze ndawonye njengethimba ngokuqaliswa ukusebenza kohlelo lukaHulumeni lokusebenza futhi ihlinzeke ngezifundo ezimqoka ngokuqaliswa kokusebenza koHlelo Lwentuthuko Lukazwelonke oseludingidwe kabanzi noluyimpumelelo, nokuyilona oluqinisa Uhlaka Lokusebenza Lwesikhathi Esimaphakathi lowezi-2014-2019.Izinqumo ezinqala zithathiwe maqondana nezinhlelo ezibambekayo ezisebenzisekayo ezizothatha ukuqaliswa ukusebenza koHlaka Lokusebenza Lwesikhathi Esimaphakathi lowezi-2014-2019 kanye noHlelo Olunamaphuzu Ayisishiyagalolunye zikubeke ezingeni eliphakem Lezi zinhlelo zidinga yonke imikhakha, ebandakanya uhulumeni, izinhlangano zomphakathi, abamabhizinisi kanye nabasebenzi, ukuba ifingqe imikhono isebenzisane ndawonye ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ndawonye sithatha iNingizimu Afrika siyibeke esicongweni sokuthuthukiswa komphakathi okuqinile kanye nokukhula komnothIzinhlelo ezibambekayo sezibekiwe ukuqinisa ukuqaliswa kokusebenza onyakeni wezimali olandelayo, okuzophinda kuvumele uhulumeni ukuba ahambelanise Uhlaka lwakhe Lokusebenza Lwezindleko Lwesikhathi Esimaphakathi (i-MTEF) kanye nokuqaliswa ukusebenza koHlelo Olunamaphuzu AyisishiyagalolunyILekgotla yeKhabhinethi igxile ezindaweni eziyisithupha ezisemqoka:1.
trg_text: Cabinet held its Lekgotla from 16 to 19 August 2016 at Sefako Makgatho Presidential Guesthouse in PretoriThe August 2016 Cabinet Lekgotla marked the halfway point of the Fifth Administration s term of officCabinet Lekgotla took time to congratulate South Africa for a peaceful, free and fair Local Government Election that took place on the 3rd of August 2016.The Lekgotla took place in the context of a continuing sub-optimal economic outlook occasioned by various internal and external factors, as well as an ever-present threat to our sovereign credit ratingThe Lekgotla provided an opportunity for Cabinet to collectively reflect on the implementation of Government s programme of action and provided crucial lessons for a much nuanced and effective implementation of the National Development Plan, which underpins the Medium Term Strategic Framework 2014-2019.Firm decisions were taken on concrete actionable plans which will take implementation of the Medium-Term Strategic Framework 2014-2019 and the Nine Point Plan to a higher leve These plans require all sectors, which includes government, civil society, business and labour, to roll up their sleeves and work together to ensure that together we take South Africa on a sustainable social development and economic growth trajectorConcrete plans have been put in place to deepen implementation in the next financial year, which also allows government to align its Medium-Term Expenditure Framework (MTEF) to the implementation of the Nine-Point PlaThe Cabinet Lekgotla focused on six key areas:1.

src_text: Eyokuqala, ukubuyekezwa kwezomnotho obanzi womhlaba wonke nowalapha ekhaya kudingidwe ndawonye kanye nezinye iziphakamiso zokuhlanganiswa kwezomnotho kanye nezikhwama zezimali onyakeni olandelayo nangale kwaw Lokhu kuvumele iKhabhinethi ukuba ikwazi ukubeka izinqumo zayo zokukhula komnotho kanye nezikhwama zezimali engqikithini yezomnotho womhlaba wonk Ukusimama komhlaba wonke kwezomnotho kusalindeleke ukuba kuqine kodwa ngezinga eliphansi kunalelo ebeliqaguliwe ngaphambilini, njengoba ukuphuma kwe-Britain kwiNhlangano Yamazwe ase-Europe (i-EU)
trg_text: First, a global and domestic macro-economic analysis was deliberated on together with further proposals for economic and fiscal consolidation in the next year and beyon This enabled Cabinet to locate its economic growth and fiscal decisions within the global economic contex Global recovery is still expected to strengthen but to a lesser degree than previously estimated, as Brexit impacts unfavourably on global growt Sub-Saharan Africa is reflecting challenging macroeconomic conditions as its major economies adjust to lower commodity proces Other risks include potential vulnerability in the Euro banking system; financial stability in emerging markets; geopolitical risks, climatic and health risk The medium-term framework sustains social gains in a weakening economic environmen Government remains committed to meeting its medium-term fiscal targets and will take additional steps to do so as conditions warran Future commitments of the state will depend on reforms that are based on effective governance, and with participation from the private-sector Second, the Cabinet Lekgotla Cabinet also reflected on the implementation of the Nine-Point Plan to grow the South African economy which was announced by President Jacob Zuma in his State of the Nation Address in February 2011.

src_text: i-Brexit - kunomthelela ongemuhle ekukhuleni komnotho womhlaba wonk Amazwe ase-Afrika aseningizimu ne-Sahara abonisa izimo zomnotho obanzi eziyinselele njengoba imithombo yayo yezeminotho emikhulu yehlela emazingeni aphansi okuthengiswa kwemikhiqizo kanye nezimpahl Ezinye izingcuphe zibandakanya ukuvuleleka ebungozini okungenzeka ohlelweni lwezokubhanga lwaseYurophu; uzinzo lwezezimali kumazwe
trg_text: This is in view of the important role played by SOCs in the radical socio-economic transformation advocated in the programme of the Fifth Administratio The implementation of the stabilisation programme has progressed with varying degree Strengthening of leadership to execute the turnaround strategies remains critica Eskom has largely been stabilised with both operational and financial performance improvin The Inter Ministerial Committee will continue to oversee thirteen (13) other SOC specific intervention The Lekgotla placed priority on the finalisation of the Shareholder Ownership Model, which will inform the legislative framework for SOC reform by November 2015.

src_text: aisafufusayo; izingcuphe zesimo sezombusazwe, ukushintshashintsha kwesimo sezulu kanye nezingcuphe zezempil Uhlaka lokusebenza lwesikhathi esimaphakathi luqinisa izinzuzo zomphakathi esimweni sezomnotho esintekentek Uhulumeni usalokhu ezibophezele ukuhlangabezana nezinjongo zakhe zezikhwama zezimali zesikhathi esimaphakathi futhi uzothatha izinyathelo ezengeziwe ukwenza lokho uma izimo zivum Izibophezelo zakusasa zombuso zizoncika ezinguqukweni ezigxile ekuphatheni ngempumelelo, kanye nokubamba iqhaza kwalabo bomkhakha ozimele Okwesibili, i-Lekgotla yeKhabhinethi iphinde yadlinza maqondana nokuqaliswa ukusebenza koHlelo Olunamaphuzu Ayisishiyagalolunye ukuze lukhulise umnotho waseNingizimu Afrika olwamenyezelwa nguMongameli uJacob Zuma Enkulumweni yakhe Echaza Isimo Sezwe ayethula ngoNhlolanja 2011.
trg_text: The focus was on key programmes and projects to deepen the implementation of the Nine-Point Plan in the next financial yea This led to the adoption of key high-impact projects for the next financial year and beyond which aim to have a substantial positive impact on the economy through unlocking key lever Cabinet took strategic decisions to secure higher impact implementation of the Industrial Policy Action Plan including:That the Department of Public Enterprises and National Treasury will consolidate procurement for locomotives into a single institution (Transnet) to ensure efficiency and compliance with the localisation requirementFinalising the evaluation of financial incentives for business to strengthen conditionalities and achieve greater value for money to enhance more inclusive growtA trade statistics architecture developed by the South African Reserve Bank, National Treasury, SARS and Stats SA will identify and hold illicit financial flowIntroducing legislative amendments to implement the 30% set asides (a new Procurement Bill developed by National Treasury) by March 2017 and unlock the potential of SMME s, cooperatives and the township and rural enterpriseImplementing the new Preferential Procurement Regulations by end August 2016 as an interim measure to this radical interventio Government will continue to focus on labour-intensive sectors, including the need for various mechanisms to support greater impact on jobs, such as the use of our incentive programmes, amongst others: clothing, textiles, leather and footwear value-chain; agro-processing and business process service The successful Oceans Economy intervention will scale up projects to expand coastal and marine tourism in order to realise significant job creatio To resolve the energy challenges in country, the Department of Energy will complete the Integrated Energy Plan and Integrated Resource Plan for Electricity by the end of 2016 to provide certainty on electricity pricing and investment in the generation capacit The Inter Ministerial Committee on Investment, Chaired by President Jacob Zuma will coordinate 40 priority investment projects across governmen These 40 projects include the agro-processing and agri-parks, energy and infrastructure, manufacturing and services project These projects were selected based on having a high-scale economic impact linked to the Nine-Point Plan; being able to take-off within the next two years; and able to crowd-in further investment and community benefit Department of Trade and Industry will finalise the strategy for the deployment of locally developed technologies by the end of 2016.

src_text: Ukugxila bekubekwe ezinhlelweni ezisemqoka kanye nemiklamo ukuze kuqiniswe ukuqaliswa kokusebenza koHlelo Olunamaphuzu Ayisishiyagalolunye onyakeni wezimali olandelay Lokhu kuholele ekwamukelweni kwemiklamo esemqoka enomthelela ophezulu onyakeni wezimali ozayo kanye nangale kwawo ehlose ukuba nomthelela omuhle kakhulu kwezomnotho ngokuqaqa amafindo asemqoka kwezomnoth IKhabhinethi ithathe izinqumo zobuqhinga ukuvikela ukuqaliswa kokusebenza okunomthelela ophezulu koHlelo Lokusebenza Lwenqubomgomo Yezezimboni (i-IPAP) kubandakanya:Ukuthi Umnyango Wezamabhizinisi Kahulumeni kanye noMnyango Wezezimali Kuzwelonke bazohlanganisa ukuthengwa kwezitimela kube sesikhungweni esisodwa (i-Transnet) ukuqinisekisa ukusebenza ngendlela egculisayo kanye nokuthotshelwa kwenqubomgomo yokuthengwa kwempahla yalapha ekhayUkuphothula ukuhlolwa kwezibonelelo zezezimali ezinikwa abamabhizinisi ukuqinisa izimo zokuzibophezela kanye nokuzuza lokho okuyifanele kakhulu imali yakho ukuthuthukisa ukukhula komnotho okufaka konke phakathUhlelo lweezibalo zohwebo olusungulwe liBhange Lombuso LaseNingizimu Afrika, uMnyango Wezezimali Kuzwelonke, Inhlangano Yokuqoqwa Kwentela eNingizimu Afrika (i-SARS) kanye neSikhungo Sezezibalo eNingizimu Afrika (i-Stats SA) luzohlonza futhi lubambe ukuphuma nokungena kwezimali okungekho emthethwenUkwethula izichibiyelo zezomthetho ukuze kuqaliswe ukusebenza kwenqubomgomo yokubekela eceleni ama-30% (uMthethosivivinywa Wokuthengwa Kwezimpahla omusha osungulwe nguMnyango Wezezimali Kuzwelonke) ngoNdasa 2017 kanye nokuthukulula amandla amabhizinisi asafufusa (ama-SMME), imifelandawonye kanye namabhizinisi asemalokishini kanye nawasezindaweni ezisemakhayUkuqaliswa ukusebenza kweZimiso Zokuthengwa Kwemisebenzi Ngokuchemile ekupheleni kukaNcwaba 2016 njengesinyathelo sesikhashana kulo mngenelelo ojule kabanz Uhulumeni uzoqhubeka nokugxila emikhakheni eqasha abantu abaningi, kubandakanya nesidingo sezindlela ezinhlobonhlobo zokweseka umthelela omkhulu kwezemisebenzi, njengokusetshenziswa kwezinhlelo zethu zezibonelelo, phakathi kokunye: imboni yezimpahla zokugqoka, indwangu, isikhumba esishukiwe kanye nemboni yokuphakelwa kwezicathulo; imisebenzi yezolimo kanye nezinhlelo zamabhizinis Izinyathelo zokungenelela eziyimpumelelo kuMnotho Wasolwandle zizokhuphula imiklamo ukuthi ikwazi ukunweba ezokuvakasha zasogwini nezasolwandle ukuze kusungulwa amathuba emisebenzi emining Ukuxazulula izingqinamba zikagesi ezikhona ezweni, Umnyango Wezamandla uzophothula Uhlelo Lwezamandla Oludidiyelwe kanye noHlelo Oludidiyelwe Lomthombo Kagesi ekupheleni kowezi-2016 ukuhlinzeka ngesiqiniseko ngamanani kagesi kanye notshalomali kwimiklamo yokuphehlwa kukages Ikomidi loNgqongqoshe Abahlukahlukene (i-IMC) Lezokutshalwa Kwezimali, uMongameli uJacob Zuma onguSihlalo kulo lizodidiyela imiklamo yokutshalwa kwezimali eseqhulwini engama-40 kuhulumeni wonkan Le miklamo engama-40 ibandakanya imisebenzi yokulungiswa kwemikhiqizo yezolimo kanye namapaki ezolimo, imisebenzi yezamandla kanye nezingqalasizinda, imisebenzi yezimboni okukhiqiza kanye nemiklamo yezinsizakal Le miklamo yakhethwa ngokugxila ekubeni nomthelela ophezulu kwezomnotho okuxhumene noHlelo Olunamaphuzu Ayisishiyagalolunye; ezokwazi ukuqala ukusebenza eminyakeni emibili; futhi ezokwazi ukuheha nolunye utshalomali kanye nemihlomulo yomphakath Umnyango Wezohwebo Nezezimboni uzophothula iqhinga lokujutshwa kwezobuchwepheshe obusungulwe lapha ezweni ngaphakathi ekupheleni kowezi-2016.
trg_text: Further, the Department of Science and Technology and the National Treasury will secure additional funds to sustain and expand the Sector Innovation Fund through the Economic Competitive Support Packag Priority continues to be placed on water saving and minimisation of water losse By September 2016, agreements are to be completed with municipalities with high water losses, to facilitate placement of agents, and a clear funding model is to be complete In fast tracking the implementation of the South African Connect Strategy to connect schools, health facilities and government offices, the ICT Policy will be finalised and approve A Broadband War Room will be established to accelerate implementation Thirdly, the Presidential Infrastructure Coordinating Commission (PICC) MANCO presented the Lekgotla with a high-level report on the implementation of the national infrastructure development programme as well as concrete infrastructure implementation plans in the next financial year and beyon The work of the PICC is closely aligned to that of the Nine-Point Plan Fourthly, a summarised progress report on the implementation of the Medium-Term Strategic Framework (MTSF) 2014-2019 was presented, which concentrated on a review of key aspects of the MTSF 2014-2019 so as to improve implementation in the next financial yea Whilst acknowledging the work done to date in the 9-Point Plan, it was also acknowledged that accelerated implementation is necessary to enhance economic growt An action plan to ensure greater expenditure on municipal infrastructure maintenance and to enforce proper financial asset management will be developed and implemented to extend the lifespan and quality of our infrastructure asset Cabinet resolved to initiate a national process towards the negotiation of a Social Compact between labour, business and government to stimulate economic growth and mitigate job losses Fifth, over and above the alignment of the MTEF to the Nine-Point Plan, the National Treasury and the Department of Planning, Monitoring and Evaluation presented their recommendations on work done in the past year to align the national budget to the National Development Plan as well as to the Medium-Term Strategic Framework (MTSF) 2014-2011.

src_text: Ngaphezu kwalokho, Umnyango Wezesayensi Nobuchwepheshe kanye noMnyango Wezezimali Kuzwelonke bazobeka izimali ezengeziwe ukuqinisa nokwandisa Isikhwama Somkhakha Wokuqamba Kabusha ngokusebenzisa Isikhwama Sokweseka Ezomnotho Ezincintisanay Ukongiwa kwamanzi kuyaqhubeka nokubekwa eqhulwini kanye nokuncishishwa kokulahlekelwa amanz NgoMandulo 2016, izivumelwano kumele ziphothulwe nomasipala abanezinga eliphezulu lokulahlekelwa ngamanzi, ukuze kugqugquzelwe ukubekwa kwezikhungo, kanti futhi uhlaka olucacile lokuxhaswa ngezimali kumele luphothulw Ukusheshisa ukuqaliswa ukusebenza kweQhinga Lokuxhumeka laseNingizimu Afrika ukuze kuxhunywe izikole, izikhungo zezempilo kanye namahhovisi kahulumeni, iNqubomgomo yoLwazi Lwezobuchwepheshe Kwezokuxhumana (--ICT) izophothulwa futhi igunyazw Ithimba Elizobhekana Ne-inthanethi Esheshayo lizosungulwa ukusheshisa ukuqaliswa kokusebenza kwale Nqubomgomo ye-ICT Okwesithathu, iKomidi Labaphathi (i-MANCO) leKhomishana Yokudidiyela Ingqalasizinda KaMongameli (i-PICC) lethulele i-Lekgotla umbiko osezingeni eliphezulu maqondana nokuqaliswa ukusebenza kohlelo lukazwelonke lokuthuthukiswa kwengqalasizinda kanjalo nezinhlelo ezibambekayo zokuqaliswa ukusebenza kwengqalasizinda onyakeni wezimali olandelayo nangalena kwaw Umsebenzi we-PICC uhanjelaniswe ngokusondelene nalowo woHlelo Olunamaphuzu Ayisishiyagalolunye Okwesine, umbiko ofingqiwe wenqubekelaphambili maqondana nokuqaliswa ukusebenza koHlaka Lokusebenza Lwesikhathi Esimaphakathi (i-MTSF) yowezi-2014-2019 wethulwa, nowagxila kakhulu ekubuyekezweni kwezingxenye ezisemqoka ze-MTSF yezi-2014-2019 ukuze kwenziwe ngcono ukuqaliswa kokusebenza onyakeni wezimali olandelay Ngenkathi kwamukelwa umsebenzi osuwenziwe kuze kube manje oHlelweni Olunamaphuzu Ayisishiyagalolunye, kuphinde kwavunywa ukuthi ukusetshenziswa ngesivinini esiphezulu kuyadingeka ukuze kuthuthukiswe ukukhula komnoth Uhlelo lokusebenza ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukusetshenziswa kwezimali eningi kwimisebenzi emaqondana nokulondolozwa kwengqalasizinda kamasipala kanye nokuqinisa ukuphathwa ngendlela efanele kwempahla eyimali luzosungulwa futhi luqaliswe ukusebenza ukwandisa isikhathi sokuphila kanye nekhwalithi yezimpahla zethu zengqalasizind IKhabhinethi inqume ukuqalisa uhlelo lukazwelonke maqondana nezingxoxo Zesivumelwano Sokusebenzisana phakathi kwabasebenzi, abamabhizinisi kanye nohulumeni ukuze kugqugquzelwe ukukhula komnotho futhi kuncishiswe nokulahleka kwemisebenzi Okwesihlanu, ngaphezu kokuhanjelaniswa kwe-MTEF noHlelo Olunamaphuzu Ayisishiyagalolunye, uMnyango Wezezimali Kuzwelonke kanye noMnyango Wezokuhlela, Ukuqapha kanye Nokuhlola bethule izincomo zabo emsebenzini owenziwe onyakeni odlule ukuhambelanisa isabelomali sikazwelonke noHlelo Lwentuthuko Lukazwelonke kanjalo noHlaka Lokusebenza Lesigaba Esimaphakathi (i-MTSF) lwezi-2014-2011.
trg_text: Work will also start for the creation of the Presidential SOCs Coordinating Council which will provide President Zuma line of sight on strategic decisions and interventions to create SOCs that play a transformative role in a capable developmental statThe decisions and plans from the Cabinet Lekgotla will bolster implementation of government s programme of action and gives confidence that South Africa is on a sustainable social development and economic growth trajectory Special Official FuneralCabinet is saddened by the passing away of the former Minister of Sports and Recreation, Reverend Arnold Makhenkesi Stofil As a veteran political activist, he participated in all pillars of government, at various provincial, national and international structurePresident Jacob Zuma declared that Reverend Stofile will be accorded a Special Official Funeral in terms of Category 2 of the State Official and Provincial Official Funeral Polic As we remember this great leader of our country, the official memorial service for the late Re Stofile is being held today, 11am at the Abbotsford Christian Centre in East Londo President Zuma ordered that the National Flag be flown at half-mast at all flag posts in the Republic of South Africa on the day of the funeraThe late Re Stofile will be laid to rest at the funeral service taking place at University of Fort Hare where he was Chancellor, on Thursday 25 August 2016 in Alice, Eastern Cape Provinc President Zuma will deliver the eulogy at the funeral of the late Reverend StofilWe convey our deepest condolences to his family and friends during this painful and difficult perioLala Ngoxolo tata StofilEnquiries:Donald LiphokoCell: 082 901 0766

src_text: Uhulumeni usehlonze iqoqo lezinto eziseqhulwini zesabelomali sezi-2017/18 ezigxile ekugcineni amazinga emali echithwa kwingqalasizinda, ukuqinisa ukwesekwa kokuthuthukiswa kwamakhono kanye nokugcina amazinga angempela ezimali ezisetshenziselwa abantu abahluphekay Umsebenzi wokuhlonza izindlela zokusebenza ezigculisayo kanye nokongiwa kwezimali esikhathini esisele se-MTEF uzoqhubeka Okwesithupha, i-Lekgotla iphinde yadlinza ngenqubekelaphambili esiyenziwe kanye nezinyathelo ezilandelayo ekuguqulweni kwezinkampani eziphethwe ngumbuso (ama-SOC) kusukela kwi-Lekgotla yeKhabhinethi yangoNhlolanja 2015.
trg_text: Government has identified a set of budget priorities for 2017/18 which focusses on maintaining infrastructure spend, strengthening support for skills development and maintaining real levels of spending on the poo Work on identifying efficiencies and savings over the remainder of the MTEF will continue Sixth, the Lekgotla also reflected on progress made and the next steps in the reform of state-owned companies (SOCs) since the Cabinet Lekgotla of February 2015.
